dct_title_s: Map of the state of New York, showing the boundaries of counties & townships, the location of cities, towns and villages, the courses of rail roads, canals & state roads
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the State of New York : showing the boundaries of counties & townships, the location of cities, towns and villages, the courses of rail roads, canals & stage roads / by J. Calvin Smith ; engraved on steel by Sherman & Smith.
dct_description_sm: Insets: The St. Lawrence River from the New York state line to Quebec -- City of New York with part of Brooklyn and Williamsburg -- Vicinity of New York, showing the line of the Croton Aqueduct and the Hudson River to Newburg.
